post:
Host Nun ✞ 50% off any VPS throughout the summer with the coupon "HDSUMMER"!

Host Nun is an internet abbey devoted to provisioning inexpensive shared and VPS hosting solutions to the general public. Our spiritual mission is to encourage and foster an ethics of poverty, chastity, obedience and ascetic integrity throughout the web hosting milieu.

We have some Orthodox (OpenVZ / SolusVM) VPS offers available throughout the summer by way of Fiberhub in Las Vegas. If you don't see a plan below that suits your needs, you're welcome to request a custom configuration. These VPS plans have been steadily growing in popularity and supplies are limited at these prices, so act fast!

Use the coupon "HDSUMMER" to receive 50% off any VPS for life!
